div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1797 Persepolis, Persis, 1934-5 (807) Burial: c. 250 B.C. (M) Contents: 10 AR. From excavations Seleucus I: 1 tetradr. (Persepolis) Bagadat: 1 tetradr. (Istakhr?) Oborzus: 1 tetradr. (Istakhr?) Autophradates I: 7 tetradr. (Istakhr?) Disposition: Teheran Newell, ESM, pp. 559-61
